title: Bloomberg Markets: Illinois at Risk of Becoming Rated Junk
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Illinois at Risk of Becoming Rated Junk
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Charles Doraine Chief Executive Officer Doraine Wealth Management Discussing Illinois at risk of becoming first junk-rated U.S. state as the Illinois House is expected to vote on measures to override Gov. Bruce Rauner's vetoes of budget bills.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
